cause.description:
We believe in the fundamental right of all children to have the security and love of a family and as such, we resolve to facilitate adoption of special needs, older and sibling children by providing financial grants to special waiting children; to actively seek out healthy and happy families who can offer love and support to waiting children; to raise public awareness of the need for healthy homes for special needs, older, and sibling children and to raise public awareness of the unique joys of parenting a special child. www.brittanyshope.org
1. Children have the fundamental right to have security and the love of a family.
cause.mission: To aid and facilitate adoptions of special children from around the world.
cause.name: Brittany's Hope Foundation
